raw_comment:
notice - one is rising, one is steady, one is slowly rising.
wonder - why china's is skyrocketing over US and India and if its a good or bad thing.
ace_sentences: I wonder why China's value is skyrocketing.
China's value is higher than the value of the US.
China's value is higher than the value of India.
I wonder if this situation is good.
I wonder if this situation is bad.
